Class StdQuerySamplerFactory

java.lang.Object
  JavaApi.Samplers.QuerySamplers.StdQuerySamplerFactory

public class StdQuerySamplerFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory for creating IQuerySampler instances according to the smapling-mode set in the given QueryWrapper

getStdQuerySampler

public static IQuerySampler getStdQuerySampler(QueryWrapper qWrapper)
Query sampler factory method which returns the relevant instance according to the given mode

Parameters:
qWrapper - - The QueryWrapper which holds the sampling-mode upon which we'll decide which instance type to return, and which will be used by this sampler
Returns:
a IQuerySampler instance which uses the given sampling mode
